decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive tactics using the partner commanders Tana, the Bloodsower and Yoshimaru, Ever Faithful. With a mix of efficient creatures like Kari Zev, Skyship Raider and Adeline, Resplendent Cathar, along with powerful equipment such as Embercleave and Skullclamp, the goal is to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage swiftly. The deck also includes removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Chain Lightning to efficiently deal with threats from the opponent. Additionally, cards like Gideon Blackblade and Sunbaked Canyon provide additional utility and flexibility in different situations. Overall, the deck aims to maintain a fast pace and apply pressure on the opponent to secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger as the commander to control the game through disruption and resource denial. It includes a mix of targeted discard spells like Cabal Therapy and Inquisition of Kozilek, along with efficient removal spells like Go for the Throat and Lightning Bolt. The deck also has graveyard recursion options such as Reanimate and Unearth to constantly bring back threats and disrupt opponent's game plan. Additional synergies with cards like Bloodchief Ascension and Waste Not help generate value from opponent's discarded cards. The deck aims to dismantle opponent's resources while steadily advancing its own game plan to outvalue and outlast opponents.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent with aggressive plays and a high amount of direct damage spells. By utilizing fast and efficient creatures like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear, alongside burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Searing Blaze, the goal is to pressure the opponent's life total quickly. Cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon disrupt the opponent's mana base, giving you an advantage in the early game. Norin, Swift Survivalist serves as a resilient and difficult-to-remove threat that can keep the pressure on. The deck aims to maintain board presence and consistently deal damage to the opponent until they are forced to concede.
